ygData.subject: RE: Fw: [EQ_Innoruuk] Talshiar, Maquis and Umriistin (or something to that effect).
ygData.msgSnippet: KNN, really make my blood boils to see all KSer rising lvl so fast.  KNN why no pple report them?  Anima is a druid, whose dd spells is after Wiz and Magi I
ygData.messageBody:
KNN, really make my blood boils to see all KSer rising lvl so fast. KNN
why no pple report them? Anima is a druid, whose dd spells is after Wiz
and Magi I think. I really hope to lvl fast so tat we can KS from them.
Btw what is Anima's lvl now? How abt Bram? Not sure if he also KS but
very low chance since he is a tank, hehe.

Ziltus.

On Monday, 30 August, 1999 10:16 AM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>
>
> Aye I guess should get Wylven. As for Anima...she is now a famous KS
at
> CT.....
>
> Btw MC for 2 days. Maybe can go camp for a Ghoulbane tonite.
Muhahahah
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Sent: Monday, August 30, 1999 09:15
> Subject: FW: [sg-everquest] Fw: [EQ_Innoruuk] Talshiar, Maquis and
Umriistin
> (or something to that effect).
>
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > Reply from Wylven. Shld QHD disband, we shld get those good pple like
> > Wylven, Anima, Bram etc over to join us. Again, be VERY careful in
> > recruitment.
> >
> > Ziltus.
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Wysh [SMTP:Wysh@...]
> > Sent: Saturday, 28 August, 1999 6:48 AM
> > To: leekw13@...
> > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Fw: [EQ_Innoruuk] Talshiar, Maquis and
> > Umriistin (or something to that effect).
> >
> > argh, well this is it..the end of HER forever..no more dark elve
wizzies
> > allowed in this guild EVER...as a matter of fact, the QHD may be
> disbanding
> > anyway.
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > To: 'wysh@...' <wysh@...>
> > Date: Friday, August 27, 1999 1:37 AM
> > Subject: FW: [sg-everquest] Fw: [EQ_Innoruuk] Talshiar, Maquis and
> > Umriistin
> > (or something to that effect).
> >
> >
> > >FYI
> > >
> > >-----Original Message-----
> > >From: Silvera tinkerbelle <eqcutie@...>
> > >To: EQ_Innoruuk@onelist.com <EQ_Innoruuk@onelist.com>
> > >Date: Friday, August 27, 1999 10:00 AM
> > >Subject: [EQ_Innoruuk] Talshiar, Maquis and Umriistin (or something to
> > that
> > >effect).
> > >
> > >
> > >>From: "Silvera tinkerbelle" <eqcutie@...>
> > >>
> > >>This is a general warning to all u hardy adventurers.
> > >>
> > >>This above mentioned person (who has changed name twice because she
is
> so
> > >>hated) is a known kill stealer and loot stealer. She is now a
"hunted"
> > >>person by most of the high levels in the realm.
> > >>
> > >>She can be recognized by her new name Umriistin (or something like
> that).
> > >>She is the green eyed darkelf (the pretty one unforunately), wearing
an
> > >>oracle robe, carrying a glowing stein and staff of writhing (same
> graphic
> > >as
> > >>POD's staff). She is in role-playing mode and may or may not still be
in
> > >the
> > >>guild <Qui'Hadom>(or however thats spelled). She is in the low level
> 30s.
> > >>
> > >>Why is she hunted by the high levels? Well, she tagged along on our
> > >>serverwide event of the slaying of Nagefen (40+ people involved).
When
> we
> > >>killed 2 of the 3 named level 52 bosses, she looted them immediately
> once
> > >>the killing party's loot period was over (they were NO DROP items,
and
> > the
> > >>group that killed it didnt have priority over the item). Whats more,
she
> > >>didnt admit to it when asked "Who looted?". Even worse, when people
SAW
> > her
> > >>loot the 2nd kill (the 1st one noone saw because we still had to deal
> > with
> > >2
> > >>fire giants after killing the boss monster), she denied and said she
was
> > >>"ducking", thats 2 different and obvious graphics from ducking and
> > looting.
> > >>Then she pushed the blame to Holyomen saying he looted. But Holyomen
was
> > >>halfway across the room! So, Kelseferious was called in (after
checking
> > >with
> > >>his supervisor) and low and behold... he did an inventory check and u
> > >>guessed it! It was in her inventory! He destroyed it and created a
new
> > one
> > >>and gave it to its elected owner. We told her to leave after, but she
> > >>wouldnt (only dragon left at this time). She went invis and stood in
the
> > >>corner. We couldnt do anything... so we went for nag... well, we
failed
> > and
> > >>many died several times. During CR, our rogues actually found
Maquis's
> > >>corpse in lava under nagafen! We were overjoyed! We did everyones CR
but
> > >>hers, she deserved nothing less. Then we all gated out. Only leaving
2
> > >>people. One of them decided to take pity on her and actually managed
to
> > get
> > >>Maquis's corpse back! DAMN! Well, Umriistin has got her equipment
back
> > now,
> > >>much to the dismay of the other 40 of us who wanted to leave her
clothed
> > >>corpse in the lava to rot (even the GMs wont do anything). She alone
> > >spoiled
> > >>what would have been an enjoyable event.
> > >>
> > >>Anyway, this is just a warning to all u out there as to what this
> > >individual
> > >>is capable of. Whether u want to take heed to this or not is up to u.
Im
> > >not
> > >>in the mood to argue or debate about ethics and stuff. If u dont
agree
> > with
> > >>me, so be it. If u do, just beware of this person. She hangs around
> > bosses
> > >>and ninja loots them once the loot time is over. She has also been
seen
> > >>around Solusek B and Cazic Thule recently. Oh and she does talk ALOT.
Do
> > >>check out the /ooc in these areas and u will probably see her talking
> > away
> > >>(she never stops!). She trains alot too.
> > >>
> > >>Silvera
> > >>One disgusted Lil Gnome
> > >>
